channel.title: Comments on: Congratulations to Erik Ellestad for winning the Ivy…

item.title: By: Mark Bridge
item.dc:creator: Mark Bridge
item.description: Congrats - great artistry! I did not know you can patent the exact ingredients of a drink and make people who use the name for it use a specific brand of rum to make it. Not just books I guess.
item.content:encoded: Congrats – great artistry! I did not know you can patent the exact ingredients of a drink and make people who use the name for it use a specific brand of rum to make it. Not just books I guess.

item.title: By: Erin Hayes
item.dc:creator: Erin Hayes
item.description: Yay! I want to try that drink!
item.content:encoded: Yay! I want to try that drink!

item.title: By: Leslie Kleinberg
item.dc:creator: Leslie Kleinberg
item.description: Congrats, Erik! Nice back story, too! :-)
item.content:encoded: Congrats, Erik! Nice back story, too! ðŸ™‚
